mapper.select: SELECT r.RESERVE_INFO_NO, r.RESERVE_INFO_TITLE, r.RESERVE_INFO_START, r.RESERVE_INFO_END, r.RESERVE_INFO_COLOR, r.EMP_CODE, r.TEAM_SHARE, r.DEPT_SHARE, r.COM_SHARE, r.MEETING_ROOM_NO, r.COM_NO, m.MEETING_ROOM_NM FROM RESERVE_INFO r JOIN MEETING_ROOM m ON r.MEETING_ROOM_NO = m.MEETING_ROOM_NO WHERE r.COM_NO = #{comNo}
SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_NO = #{deptNo}
SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE_INFO WHERE MEETING_ROOM_NO = #{meetingRoomNo} AND #{reserveInfoStart} < RESERVE_INFO_END AND #{reserveInfoEnd} > RESERVE_INFO_START
